name: Epic.Sentinel_Dark_Mastery
display_help: You have Mastery over Darkness to control and blast your foes.

powers.name: Epic.Sentinel_Dark_Mastery.Netherworld_Tentacles
powers.display_help: You can create a cone shaped rift to the Netherworld that allows its native creatures to slip their oily Tentacles into our reality. These creatures will snare all foes within range, Immobilizing them while the Tentacles drain their life and reduce their chance to hit. Damage: Minor(DoT), Recharge: Slow
powers.display_short_help: Ranged (Cone), Minor DoT(Negative), Foe Immobilize, -To Hit, -Fly

display_info.Effect Area: Cone — 60 ft. radius 60° arc (10 targets max)

display_info: 3 ticks of 6.87 negative energy damage over 5.2s on target after 1s delay
3 ticks of 7.40 negative energy damage over 5.2s on target after 1s delay
10000.00% resistance to knockup, knock for 15s on target
-100.0 knockup protection, knock protection for 15s on target

powers.name: Epic.Sentinel_Dark_Mastery.Smite
powers.display_help: You wrap your fists with Negative Energy channeled from the Netherworlds, then perform a Smite that deals more damage than Shadow Punch, but has a longer recharge time. Smite clouds the target's vision, lowering their chance to hit for a short time. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Slow

powers.name: Epic.Sentinel_Dark_Mastery.Netherworld_Grasp
powers.display_help: Mastery over the forces of the Netherworld allows you to summon dark tentacles to render your target helpless and inflicting moderate negative energy damage. Even if the target is powerful enough to resist the power's hold effect they will have their chance to hit reduced. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Slow
powers.display_short_help: Ranged, Moderate DMG(Negative), Foe Hold, -To Hit

powers.name: Epic.Sentinel_Dark_Mastery.Engulfing_Darkness
powers.display_help: You release a burst of negative energy to foes around you dealing moderate Negative Energy damage, reducing their chance to hit and sapping their health over time. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Slow
powers.display_short_help: PBAoE, Moderate DMG(Negative), Foe -To Hit, Minor DoT(Negative)

powers.name: Epic.Sentinel_Dark_Mastery.Darkest_Night
powers.display_help: While active, you channel Negative Energy onto a targeted foe. Darkest Night decreases the damage potential and chance to hit of the target, and all foes nearby, as long as you keep the power active. Recharge: Slow
